#In Game Commands

= Keyboard Shortcutes =

*TAB* - Open Main Menu / Player Menu

*F2* - Take Ownership of Car / Place item into inventory.

*F3* - Open Player Inventory.

*F4*  - Open Shop/Build Menu 

= Chat Commands =


= Console Commands =

*pnrp_save* - Save all aspects of your character.  Soon to be modified.

*pnrp_load* - Loads your character.  Will be locked to admin only in the future.

*pnrp_loadweps* - Loads character weapons.  Will be locked admin only in the future.
